Text: Thanks a lot footy for an another great release.I was waiting for this game.And 720p and u have English commendary and thats all very fine dude.So keep up the awesome job and keep the games rolling.;-)
Thanks for the torrent!, but how do i watch it in english? Right now the spoken language is russian.
@madude123: open the torrent, click on sound, click on piece of sound (that's how i translate it from greek, is the first in the list anyway) and you choose language. :-)
@Madude123  : if you  are using VLC player, Go to Audio -> Audio Track -> select english from the list
